arabicText: ۞ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِىٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	sent	the	divine	revelation	to	Moosa	that,	“Journey	along	with	My	bondmen	within	the	
night,	for	you	will	be	pursued.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hamne	Mūsā	ko	waḥi		bheji	ke	rātoñ	rāt	mere	bandoñ	ko	le	nikal	be-shak	tumhārā	peechā	
honā	hai

englishTranslationText: So	Firaun	sent	gatherers	into	the	cities.
romanUrduTranslationText: Ab	fir’aun	ne	shahroñ	mein	jam’ā	karne	wāle	bheje

englishTranslationText: They	announced	“These	people	are	a	small	group.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Ke	yeh	log	ek	thodi	jamā’at	haiñ

englishTranslationText: “And	indeed	they	have	angered	all	of	us.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	be-shak	ham	sabkā	dil	jalāte	haiñ

englishTranslationText: “And	indeed	we	are	an	alert	army.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	be-shak	ham	sab	chaukanne	haiñ

englishTranslationText: We	therefore	got	them	out	from	the	gardens	and	water	springs.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	hamne	unheiñ	bāhar	nikālā	bāghoñ	aur	chashmoñ

englishTranslationText: And	from	treasures	and	nice	houses.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	khazānoñ	aur	umdah	makānoñ	se.

englishTranslationText: So	it	was;	and	We	made	the	Descendants	of	Israel	its	inheritors.
romanUrduTranslationText: Hamne	aisā	hi	kiyā	aur	unkā	wāris	kardiyā	bani	Isrā’il	ko

englishTranslationText: So	the	Firaun’s	people	followed	them	at	sunrise.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	fir’auniyoñ	ne	unkā	ta’akub	kiyā	din	nikle

arabicText: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَـٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	the	two	groups	saw	each	other,	
those	with	Moosa	said,	“They	have	caught	
us.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	āmnā	sāmnā	huā	dono	girohoñ	kā	Mūsā		
wāloñ	ne	kahā	hamko	unhoñ	ne	āa	liyā

arabicText: قَالَ كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
englishTranslationText:
Said	Moosa,	“Never!	Indeed	my	Lord	is	
with	me,	He	will	now	show	me	the	way.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Mūsā	ne	farmāyā:	yuñ	nahiñ	be-shak	merā	Rab	
mere	sāth	hai	woh		mujhe	ab	rāh	detā	hai

arabicText: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ ۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍۢ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
So	We	sent	the	divine	revelation	to	Moosa	
that,	“Strike	the	sea	with	your	staff”;	
thereupon	the	sea	parted;	so	each	part	was	
like	a	huge	mountain.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	hamne	Mūsā	ko	waḥi	farmāyi	ke	dariyā	par	
apnā	ásā	mār	to	jabhi	daryā	phat	gayā	to	har	
hissa	hogayā	jaise	badā	pahād

englishTranslationText:
And	We	brought	the	others	close	to	that	
place.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	wahāñ	qareeb	lāye	ham	doosroñ	ko

englishTranslationText: And	We	saved	Moosa	and	all	those	with	him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hamne	bachā	liyā	Mūsā	aur	uske	sab	sāth	
wāloñ	ko

englishTranslationText: Then	drowned	the	others.
romanUrduTranslationText: Phir	doosro	ko	dubo	diyā

arabicText: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	in	this	is	surely	a	sign,	and	most	of	
them	were	not	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	is	meiñ	zaroor	nishāni	hai	aur	un	meiñ	
aksar	Musalmān	na	they

englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	your	Lord	-	only	He	is	the	
Almighty,	the	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak	tumhārā	Rab	wohi	izzat	wālā	
maherbān		hai

englishTranslationText: And	recite	to	them	the	news	of	Ibrahim
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	unpar	padho	khabar	Ibrāhim	ki

arabicText: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
When	he	said	to	his	father	and	his	people,	
“What	do	you	worship?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	usne	apne	bāp	aur	apni	qaom	se	farmāyā	
tum	kyā	poojte	ho?

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًۭا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَـٰكِفِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“We	worship	idols,	and	we	keep	
squatting	in	seclusion	before	them.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole:	ham	butoñ	ko	pujte	haiñ	phir	unke	sāmne	
āasan	māre	(Pooja	ke	liye	jam	kar	baithey)		
rahte	haiñ.

englishTranslationText: He	said,	“Do	they	hear	you	when	you	call?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farmāyā:	kyā	woh		tumhāri	sunte	hai	jab	tum	
pukāro?

englishTranslationText: “Or	do	they	benefit	you	or	harm	you?”
romanUrduTranslationText: Yā	tumhārā	kuch	bhalā	burā	karte	haiñ?

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“In	fact	we	found	our	
forefathers	doing	likewise.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole:	balke	hamne	apne	bāp	dādā	ko	aisā	hi	
karte	pāyā

englishTranslationText: He	said,	“Do	you	see	these	–	(the	idols)	whom	you	worship?
romanUrduTranslationText: Farmāyā	to	kyā	tum	dekhte	ho	yeh	jinheiñ	pooj	rahe	ho?

englishTranslationText: “You	and	your	forefathers	preceding	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Tum	aur	tumhāre	agle	bāp	dādā

arabicText: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّۭ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText: “They	are	all	my	enemies,	except	the	Lord	Of	The	Creation.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	woh	sab	mere	dushman	haiñ	magar	parwardigāre	āalam

englishTranslationText: “The	One	Who	created	me,	so	He	will	guide	me.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Woh		jisne	mujhe	paidā	kiyā	to	woh	mujhe	rāh	degā

englishTranslationText: “And	the	One	Who	feeds	me	and	gives	me	to	drink.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	woh	jo	mujhe	khilātā	aur	pilātā	hai

englishTranslationText: “And	when	I	fall	ill,	so	it	is	He	Who	heals	me.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	jab	maiñ	beemār	hoñ	to	wohi	mujhe	shifā	detā	hai

englishTranslationText: “And	He	will	give	me	death,	then	resurrect	me.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	woh		mujhe	wafāt	degā	phir	mujhe	zindah	karegā

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
englishTranslationText: “And	the	One,	Who	I	hope,	will	forgive	me	my	mistakes	on	the	Day	of	Judgement.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	woh		jiski	mujhe	āas	lagi	hai	ke	meri	khatāyeiñ	Qayāmat	ke	din	bakhshe	gā

arabicText: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًۭا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
englishTranslationText: “My	Lord,	bestow	me	the	command	and	join	me	with	those	who	deserve	your	proximity.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aey	mere	Rab	mujhe	hukm	áṭa	kar	aur	mujhe	unse	milā	de	jo	tere	Qurbe	khās	ke	sazāwār	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍۢ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	give	me	proper	fame	among	the	
succeeding	generations.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	meri	sachchi	nāmwari	rakh	pichloñ	meiñ
